EmailTemplate.description: Used for initial response to customer that we received their complaint.
EmailTemplate.name: Case: Initial Response to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Your DuPont Protection Technologes Complaint Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
We have received your complaint and will process
Regards, DuPont Quality Team
